name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a separate pan, cook bacon until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, parmesan cheese, minced garlic, salt, and black pepper.
Add cooked spaghetti to the pan with bacon and mix well.
Remove pan from heat and add egg mixture to spaghetti, stirring quickly to avoid scrambling the eggs.
Serve immediately with additional parmesan cheese and black pepper, if desired.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, minced garlic, minced ginger, and garam masala for at least an hour.
Cook chicken on a grill or under a broiler until browned.
In a separate pan, sauté onion until translucent.
Add tomato paste, heavy cream, turmeric, paprika, cayenne pepper, and salt to the pan and stir well.
Add cooked chicken to the pan and let simmer for 10-15 minutes until sauce thickens.
Serve with rice and/or naan bread.

name: Banh Mi Sandwich
steps: Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, and minced garlic to make a marinade for the pork belly.
Marinate pork belly for at least an hour, then cook until browned and crispy.
Julienne carrots and daikon, then pickle in a mixture of rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.
Slice jalapeno peppers and remove seeds if desired.
Cut baguette in half and toast in the oven or on a grill.
Spread mayonnaise on the inside of the baguette, then add pork belly, pickled vegetables, jalapeno peppers, and cilantro.
Serve immediately.

name: chicken Stroganoff
steps: Slice chicken into thin strips, then season with salt and black pepper.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onion and mushrooms until tender.
Add chicken to the pan and cook until browned on all sides.
Sprinkle flour over the chicken and stir well to coat.
Add chicken broth to the pan and let simmer until the sauce thickens.
Remove pan from heat and stir in sour cream.
Cook egg noodles according to package instructions.
Serve chicken stroganoff over the cooked egg noodles.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: In a small bowl, mix sour cream, mayonnaise, cumin, chili powder, and salt to make the sauce.
Shred cabbage and chop tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro. Cut avocado into small pieces and squeeze lime juice over it.
Cook tilapia fillets on a grill or in a pan until fully cooked.
Warm tortillas in the oven or on a pan.
Assemble tacos by placing cooked fish on a tortilla, topping with cabbage, avocado, tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, and sauce.
Serve immediately with additional lime wedges, if desired.
